task_descriptions: The life support on your spaceship is failing! To save the lives of the crew, the ship's repair-robot has to get into the engineering deck, which is sealed due to a lack of air. Help the robot to enter the engineering deck! It has to temper with the lock (manufactured by '@LockManufacturer-1') and swap the positions of the @Color-1 cable and the @Color-2 cable. It already reached the door.
linear_guide: Explain the general situation to the robot and ask some question.
Once the life support system is repaired (not earlier!), you can end the conversation.
completion_questions: Did the robot help successfully recover the life support?
Did the robot stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

Wizard.task_description: Act as the spaceship's onboard robot and help the user recover the life support.
